verbs.description: [ARG0: The tiny island - state of Singapore] not only [V: hosted] [ARG1: the historic meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] , but it also racked up a $ 15 million bill .

The tiny island - state of Singapore not only hosted the historic meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on Tuesday , but [ARG0: it] [ARGM-DIS: also] [V: racked] up [ARG1: a $ 15 million bill] .
